subSections.title: Han character
subSections.text:
{{Han char|rn=91|rad=片|as=13|sn=17|canj=LLTCD|four=|ids=⿰片業}}

# (same as [[業]]) in ancient China
# big piece of board (plank) on a music rack with the carving of the shape of saw's teeth, used to hang clock (musical stone
# drum
# etc.)
# instruction
